title: Log In
html_content:
Request Body

{
    "username": "...",
    "password": "..."
}
{ "username": "...", "password": "..." }

Response Body

Successful Authentication

HTTP 200, with JSON response body in which 'token' is the JWT token to be set in cookie 'jwtToken' in next API requests:
